page.title: 05LITTLEPORT GAZETTE
page.content: One{reporter}is responsible for the Littleport page in this area's paper. His contacts are made by getting involved, visiting people, going to board meetings and getting to know people.The main issues are the school moving to Ely, and the{by-pass.}The final deadline is Monday, and the Littleport page comes out on Thursday. In Littleport there are plenty of shops and friendly people but there is a shortage of things to do. The problems of Littleport are no investment of money and no access. The advantages will be the by-pass and the short ride to{Cambridge.}Littleport will change in the future by growing. The closure of{LVC}is a bad thing for youngsters because they lose contact with Littleport. The by-pass is a good thing as it will bring new businesses and homes. There are 2 free weeklies.
